Brian,

Brian,

Thanks for the opportunity!

Bob,
Thanks for the scans...I replied yesterday afternoon, but it looks like you didn't get it. 
Maybe you should check your junk or spam email folders just in case. I've heard that much of my email drivel belongs there...but for this project I am hoping we can work it out :o

I did re-send again tonight...

Thanks for the scans...I replied yesterday afternoon, but it looks like you didn't get it.
